room_title: Escape room "The Curiosity Shop" by Wizards & Wires Studios in Redlands
review: This is an incredible escape room. A bit creepy with great ambiance. A room full of antiques and mysterious artifacts. Some have meanings and others are for show. No hints or clues here. Just a great hour of enjoyment and surprises!

room_title: Escape room "The Curiosity Shop" by Wizards & Wires Studios in Redlands
review: Just got done with this escape room. It was an awesome experience and highly recommend it. None of us have been before and had a blast. This was our first time and we are excited to do more!

room_title: Escape room "The Curiosity Shop" by Wizards & Wires Studios in Redlands
review: Soooo amazing!!! We had the best time and cant wait to come back! Well worth the money and not far!! Totally creeped us out and was just hard enough to make it amazing!!!! THANK YOU!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Curiosity Shop" by Wizards & Wires Studios in Redlands
review: This place is PHENOMENAL! Our group of 4 had a blast! It was our first time doing an escape room, and we are now hooked. Very interactive and a lot of clues to look for. We finished with just under 8 minutes to spare. Staff was awesome and friendly. Highly recommended!
